name: Birds are evil and hate Snowmen
name_original: Birds are evil and hate Snowmen
description:
Defend your snowman against the evil birds !

Itch.io version is the jam version with a small bugfix on title music, that wasn't systematically played

Original jam version still available here: https://bellatrion.space/games/Potat0s_Jam_Rapide_2/web/

POST-JAM Version (small graphics fixes, collisions updated, bigger snowballs): https://bellatrion.space/games/Potat0s_Jam_Rapide_2/post_jam/

Made by The Sin Preacher and Bellatrion

Title font: Early Gameboy par Jimmy Campbell
